movies.title: Tokyo Booty Nights
movies.originalTitle: Danchi no okusan dosokai ni iku
movies.plot: Yuji and Akiko are newlyweds. Yuji dreams of being a movie star. He lands the lead role in a Pink Eiga soft-core sex film. The director requires him to have sex with the actress. Akiko goes to her high school reunion and is raped by a drunken guy, and then hooks up with her ex-high school love. A dark and comedic look at contemporary relationships and the pitfalls of married life. The story was written by Locarno International Film Festival, Golden Leopard Prize Winner, Masahiro Kobayashi.
movies.simplePlot: Yuji and Akiko are newlyweds. Yuji dreams of being a movie star. He lands the lead role in a Pink Eiga soft-core sex film. The director requires him to have sex with the actress. Akiko goes...

biography.bio: Yumeka Sasaki is an actress, known for Twitch: You Are My Toy (2004), Gushonure biyôshi: Sukebena kahanshin (1998) and A Lonely Cow Weeps at Dawn (2003).
biography.name: Yumeka Sasaki

biography.bio: Yôta Kawase was born on December 28, 1969 in Kawasaki, Japan. He is an actor, known for The Wart (1996), Omoi wa anata dake: I Thought About You (1997) and Jukujo soap: Tsukinuke hassha (1998).
biography.name: Yôta Kawase

biography.bio: Shingo Mukai is an actor, known for Hate shinai yokujô: Mowaseste! (2000), Lost virgin: Yamitsuki enjo kôsai (2002) and Shitagaru aniyome 2: Midara na tawamure (1999).
biography.name: Shingo Mukai

biography.bio: Kyôko Kazama was born on February 20, 1977 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Kyonyû na shimai: Tanima ni suitsuke (2006), Bihada kyôshi: Kyonyû vibe zeme (2005) and Nettorizuma onedarizuma III: Furinzuma matagaru (1997).
biography.name: Kyôko Kazama

biography.bio: Takahiko Kobayashi was born on February 3, 1962. He is an actor, known for Mibôjin: mofuku no modae (1993), Chikan onanie nozoki (1992) and Chikan densha: Rie no fundoshi (1990).
biography.name: Takahiko Kobayashi

biography.bio: Lemon Hanazawa is an actress, known for Tamamono (2004), Yokujô hitch-hike: Motometa hitozuma (2005) and Bihada kyôshi: Kyonyû vibe zeme (2005).
biography.name: Lemon Hanazawa

biography.bio: Takeshi Itô is known for his work on Renzoku onanie: midareppanashi (1994), The Dream of Garuda (1994) and Abunai jôji: Kemono no shitatari (1998).
biography.name: Takeshi Itô

biography.bio: Kikujirô Honda was born in 1965 in Niigata, Japan. He is an actor, known for Monzetsu honban: buchikomu! (1995), Bashing (2005) and Shinjuku mesu nikki: Mayoi neko (1998).
biography.name: Kikujirô Honda

biography.bio: Shirô Shimomoto was born on August 14, 1948 in Osaka, Japan. He is an actor and director, known for Uncle's Paradise (2006), S&M Hunter (1986) and Rikon-zuma kaikan onanie (1992).
biography.name: Shirô Shimomoto

biography.bio: Ayako Hashimoto is a cinematographer and actor, known for Wa.Re.Me. (2006), Mahô shôjo wo wasurenai (2011) and Sex haitatsunin: Onna todokemasu (2003).
biography.name: Ayako Hashimoto

biography.bio: Mitsuru Meike was born on May 11, 1969 in Kanagawa, Japan. He is an assistant director and director, known for Gushonure biyôshi: Sukebena kahanshin (1998), Hatsujô kateikyôshi: sensei no aijiru (2003) and Harenchi family: Newaza de ippatsu (2002).
biography.name: Mitsuru Meike

biography.bio: Rei Sakamoto is an assistant director and director, known for My Technicolor Girl (2016), Sex Friend Nurezakari (1999) and The Suicide Chain (2001).
biography.name: Rei Sakamoto

biography.bio: Daikei Shimizu was born in 1948 in Hyogo Prefecture, Japan. He is an actor and director, known for Rape ganbô: Watashi o ikasete! (1996), Tandem (1994) and Injû chôkyô: Kyokugen rape (1997).
biography.name: Daikei Shimizu

biography.bio: Hiroyuki Ueno is known for his work on High & Low: The Story of S.W.O.R.D. (2015), Bandage (2010) and Piece (2012).
biography.name: Hiroyuki Ueno
